item.title: By: Jen

item.description: I Really enjoyed working with them. Good job guys...Night Owls :)
item.content:encoded: I Really enjoyed working with them. Good job guys…Night Owls

item.title: By: Jamie
item.dc:creator: Jamie
item.description: They are AWESOME!!!! Night Owl Interactive is the most talented web design & development team in New York City.
item.content:encoded: They are AWESOME!!!! Night Owl Interactive is the most talented web design & development team in New York City.

item.title: By: EB-Corporate Rewards
item.dc:creator: EB-Corporate Rewards
item.description: The main service that NightOwlInteractive.com provides is giving that professional look to our client-branded websites which not only leads to a more satisfied clients, it helps us in presenting and pitching to new clients.
item.content:encoded: The main service that NightOwlInteractive.com provides is giving that professional look to our client-branded websites which not only leads to a more satisfied clients, it helps us in presenting and pitching to new clients.

item.title: By: Jennifer Hong
item.dc:creator: Jennifer Hong
item.description: We worked directly with the art director at Night Owl Interactive, which was very helpful. Even after the website launched, Night Owl's helped us with any technical issue that arises... Check out nightowlinteractive.com
item.content:encoded: We worked directly with the art director at Night Owl Interactive, which was very helpful. Even after the website launched, Night Owl’s helped us with any technical issue that arises… Check out nightowlinteractive.com
